mapper.insert:
insert into ceap.tb_clazz(cl_name, cl_num, cl_grade, sp_id, create_time, modify_time, deleted) values
(#{entity.clName}, #{entity.clNum}, #{entity.clGrade}, #{entity.spId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.deleted})

insert into ceap.tb_clazz(cl_name, cl_num, cl_grade, sp_id, create_time, modify_time, deleted) values
(#{entity.clName}, #{entity.clNum}, #{entity.clGrade}, #{entity.spId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.deleted})
on duplicate key update cl_name = values(cl_name) , cl_num = values(cl_num) , cl_grade = values(cl_grade) , sp_id = values(sp_id) , create_time = values(create_time) , modify_time = values(modify_time) , deleted = values(deleted)
